features.situation: from followers of your deity
from members of your religion and those who respect your faith
from ordinary animals

7ddae5ca-ec6b-423d-a4de-94969906f8e2.name: Universal
7ddae5ca-ec6b-423d-a4de-94969906f8e2.notes: Reaction modifier applies regardless of race

features.situation: from others who see your looks

c717b02e-8d9d-4a7d-b182-3108bd802809.name: Fit
c717b02e-8d9d-4a7d-b182-3108bd802809.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, or resist poison

4a3ea028-1ac3-4645-a607-5d831c15ac99.name: Very Fit
4a3ea028-1ac3-4645-a607-5d831c15ac99.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

features.situation: to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison

a158acfa-ebad-4dd3-90e3-e965468fa14a.name: Indomitable
a158acfa-ebad-4dd3-90e3-e965468fa14a.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

features.situation: from explorers and nature lovers
to others' Hearing roll in siturations where you want to be heard over noise
to your effective HT whenever you roll to recover lost HP or to see if you can get over a crippling injury

083ee360-33df-4ab1-8bf5-520f9e31f2e7.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

41a45799-45da-4588-9714-368b1bfaf62a.name: Alternate Benefit
41a45799-45da-4588-9714-368b1bfaf62a.notes: Bonus to HT rolls for a specific patient and condition if treated full time.

features.situation: from patients

5a57eeb0-bd61-460b-8f94-f8d40ac9bc2b.name: Longevity
5a57eeb0-bd61-460b-8f94-f8d40ac9bc2b.notes: You fail aging rolls only on a 17 or 18, or only on an 18 if your modified HT is 17 or better

110046ca-f474-4b43-877e-bd18510acdab.name: Specialized
110046ca-f474-4b43-877e-bd18510acdab.notes: @Type: Angels, Demons, Elementals, Faerie, Ghosts, etc.@

features.situation: to skill rolls when working on lengthy tasks, but -3 to notice any important interruption

8366c089-a73c-483c-bb0d-8df2a702dbf2.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
8366c089-a73c-483c-bb0d-8df2a702dbf2.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

features.situation: from pious folk
to others on all Empathy, Body Language, and Psychology rolls to discern your intentions or the truth of your words
to others on IQ, Detect Lies, and Gambling rolls in any Quick Contest with your Acting, Fast-Talk, or Gambling skill when you try to lie or bluff
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

268007e9-4952-47eb-b594-8b5223906fb6.name: Overconfidence
268007e9-4952-47eb-b594-8b5223906fb6.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

aca9b3d3-70e4-404c-afc3-e11446bfd4ce.name: Selfish
aca9b3d3-70e4-404c-afc3-e11446bfd4ce.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

5402e99f-c972-41dd-bac5-4bc82d913457.name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
5402e99f-c972-41dd-bac5-4bc82d913457.notes: You are a member of a minority that the dominant culture around you regards as “barbarians” or “inferior.”

features.situation: from others except your own kind
from others of your own kind in an area, profession, or situation where your minority is especially rare

b532e2c5-d0d6-4bf3-9057-15439bcb7181.name: Absent-Mindedness
b532e2c5-d0d6-4bf3-9057-15439bcb7181.notes: Once adrift in your own thoughts, you must roll against Perception-5 in order to notice any event short of personal physical injury

features.situation: to all IQ and IQ-based skill rolls, save those for the task you are currently concentrating on
from most people and animals (although pests or carrion-eating scavengers might be attracted to you!)

a5b976df-ebbb-4877-a846-c531bd33fce9.name: Flashbacks
a5b976df-ebbb-4877-a846-c531bd33fce9.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

e66d07e9-3a32-4993-9ec4-ab99f97d440e.name: Mild
e66d07e9-3a32-4993-9ec4-ab99f97d440e.notes: Duration: 2d seconds; -2 on all skill rolls

dea65bf7-f5a5-408b-be53-69896a7394b9.name: Severe
dea65bf7-f5a5-408b-be53-69896a7394b9.notes: Duration: 1d minutes; -5 on all skill rolls

9529ef70-5491-4e2e-b152-9c00304b6972.name: Crippling
9529ef70-5491-4e2e-b152-9c00304b6972.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use

c5495c95-d6a1-407c-aed4-2469e5508985.name: Loner
c5495c95-d6a1-407c-aed4-2469e5508985.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

6807c1e8-8c49-4071-8571-577a4dd8cef6.name: Lunacy
6807c1e8-8c49-4071-8571-577a4dd8cef6.notes: During the full moon, you are extremely emotional and volatile, while on nights of the new moon you are very passive (you temporarily suffer from the Laziness disadvantage, B142). While the moon is waxing, you are focused and pleasant; while it is waning, you are apathetic and a little touchy.

features.situation: to all Will and self-control rolls during the full moon
to skill for others to cast a spell on you
to resist spells
to skill for others to cast a spell on you
to resist spells

82f45c33-f4cb-4c11-8937-f6d08e6714f4.name: Phantom Voices (Annoying)
82f45c33-f4cb-4c11-8937-f6d08e6714f4.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he may roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you hear voices. The GM will always roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

df592832-449f-41de-96c8-0766703badf3.name: Phantom Voices (Disturbing)
df592832-449f-41de-96c8-0766703badf3.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he may roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you hear voices. The GM will always roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

features.situation: from others

871901d4-6056-420f-8f21-b3388a038a48.name: Truthfulness
871901d4-6056-420f-8f21-b3388a038a48.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.

13b21a2b-709a-49d1-82b1-e8001f7b60b2.name: Add 2 points to a primary skill

name.qualifier: Add 2 points to a primary skill

6092fe24-4244-4cda-8124-d4297a297947.name: Area Knowledge
6092fe24-4244-4cda-8124-d4297a297947.notes: The inhabitants, trails, streams, hiding places, ambush sites, flora,

180f178a-7cd9-470e-85a8-c8f09d0b232e.name: Add 1 point to a secondary skill

name.qualifier: Add 1 point to a secondary skill

8e2a1ec0-3597-4b86-81f4-ff7a27873d52.name: Place 1 point in a Magical Style skill

name.qualifier: Place 1 point in a Magical Style skill

f1c86578-c32a-4cd6-9eac-0b1c4c8890c7.name: Select the style that was chosen earlier

3140d84a-f007-4ec3-95d1-cb50c5e07af5.name: Summon Spirit (Winged Folk spirits regardless of burial rites)

07fd19ae-c875-47ce-92b6-303d30783d23.name: Shape Metal
07fd19ae-c875-47ce-92b6-303d30783d23.casting_cost: 6 per cu yard (4 for soft metals)
